description: A person's handedness. The terms of the value set have parents: Handedness finding (364940007), which IS_A General finding of the hand (248404001), AND Finding related to cerebral function (106165002). They all interpret Handedness (observable entity) (57427004). Hand preference (observable entity) IS_A Cerebral dominance (observable entity) (363823006).

references.description: The SNOMED code represents Hand preference (observable entity)
The SNOMED code represents Left handed (finding)
The SNOMED code represents Right handed (finding)
The SNOMED code represents Unknown handedness (finding)
